name: For the Record
description:
For the Record is a puzzle/horror game in which the player must navigate the levels and puzzles using their enchanted record player. The music from the records you play from the record player will affect and manipulate the levels and enemies in the game. 

The player must use these records in various ways to solve the puzzles and complete the levels without dying.

―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――
